paragraph: Joe Musten is an American musician who started his musical career in 1999. He formed Beloved, Advent, Your Son Is Dead, and Torn. In 2008, he joined the band The Almost after former drummer Kenny Bozich quit the band. Joe was featured in the December 2009 issue of DRUM Magazine alongside former bandmate Aaron Gillespie. He formed  the band, Torn, and was featured on the self-titled debut album, but was un-credited.
He is cousins with his bandmate, Dusty Redmon. Musten is married and has twins.
